FuncDef:
The nat64 time local command enables a device to display the local time in logs.
The undo nat64 time local command enables a device to display the UTC time in logs.
By default, a device displays the UTC time in logs.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
A NAT64 syslog log format can be flexible configured for a customer-specific log system. To enable a device to display the local time in logs, run the nat64 time local command.
Prerequisites
Create a flexible NAT log template and enter the flexible NAT log template view.
